result.title: Invitation for EXIBIT OPC
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I would like to invite you all to EXIBIT OPC , 3 hour coding contest conducted by CSE DEPARTMENT of IIT MADRAS.

Contest duration is 3 hours.

Contest time : March 14 9:00 PM IST to March 15 12 : 00 AM IST

Contest Link : https://www.hackerrank.com/exebit-opc

I am the problem setter.

Hope to see you in the contest.

Thanks.
